name: SupplyHog Holdings, LLC.
description: Provider of an online marketplace designed to sell construction supplies. The company's online marketplace offers drop shipping and contractor-level pricing services along with hardware and building supplies, enabling general contractors to procure building materials.
one_liner: Provider of an online marketplace designed to sell construction supplies. The company's online marketplace offers drop shipping and contractor-level pricing services along with hardware and building supplies, enabling general contractors to procure building materials.
